Posts.EditableText: so after going through all the posts, I have come to the realization that al's library is for single player so I had to quit using it.  Which leaves me with a dilemma.  How do I make containers for multiplayer?  I know it would involve creating a dummy room or 2 and a procedure or 3.  I tried looking over al's code but it is so extensive that I couldn't understand it.  If anyone could help, i would appreciate it.

Posts.EditableText: Hi I'm pretty sure Alex has said Quest 4 will feature pre-made containers, so I'd sit on the fence until it is released if I were you. I did start to modify my typelib to multi user (as well almost finishing a new and massively improved version of the single player library) but then Alex announced V4 was in the offing and so I just shelved the whole thing until I see what the new version offers as inbuilt functionality - I'm not into re-inventing the wheel. Al (MaDbRiT)
